snippet: There are major benefits and big risks in what some Republican-led states want to do.
abstract: Editorial underlines both benefits and risks to Republican officials' plans in some states to redirect federal money intended to expand Medicaid and use it instead to buy private health insurance for Medicaid recipients; urges federal officials to enforce strict conditions before agreeing to any redirection of Medicaid dollars.
lead_paragraph: There are major benefits and big risks in what some Republican-led states want to do.

headline.seo: Using Medicaid Dollars for Private Insurance
headline.main: Using Medicaid Dollars for Private Insurance
headline.print_headline: Using Medicaid Dollars for Private Insurance
